Summary Note:
The Relationship Manager (RM) first met Sørensen Jespersen Krog at a charity gala in Copenhagen. They had a long conversation about their mutual interest in philanthropy and decided to stay in touch.
Sørensen Jespersen Krog is a 34 year old and comes from Denmark.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Sørensen Jespersen Krog is currently single. He does not have any children.
Education Background:
In 2009, Sørensen finished his secondary school education at Rysensteen Gymnasium.
Sørensen received his degree from CBS International Business School in 2013.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 10 years, Sørensen Jespersen Krog has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Sørensen Jespersen Krog launched his career as a Stockbroker at Danica Pension Försäkringsaktiebolag, where he gained valuable experience from 2015 to 2017.
In 2019, he moved to Investors A/S to work as a Portfolio Manager, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 420000 DKK, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Esbjerg Ø, Hillerød and Vejle, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.

Following the passing of his grandmother, a successful Private Equity Manager, he received an inheritance of 3670000 DKK in 2016, which he has used to secure his financial future.
Client Summary: Based on the information provided, we are excited about the client's financial journey and look forward to supporting him in achieving his financial goals.
